abstract: JPMorgan Chase on Tuesday continued to shuffle its top management ranks, including by appointing one of its most senior investment bankers as its new chief financial officer.
snippet: JPMorgan Chase on Tuesday continued to shuffle its top management ranks, including by appointing one of its most senior investment bankers as its new chief financial officer.
lead_paragraph: JPMorgan Chase continued to shuffle its top management ranks on Tuesday, appointing one of its most senior investment bankers chief financial officer.

headline.main: JPMorgan Names Braunstein C.F.O. in Shake-Up
